title: CS537 Tutor Needed
body: Haven't done very well on the projects and mid-term, really need to pass this class. Are there any solid tutors out there that can give 1:1 tutoring with assignments and test prep the rest of the semester?
comments: When I took the course, I read the textbook as much as possible (which wasn’t the case for any other class) and just grinded on the projects during office hours until I got them done
